title: Loss Prevented 2/3/2015 NOW RIOT
body:
Our whole team dissconnects countless times whilst 2 people from thier team DONT DC which ultimatley causes in free pentas and quadras late game AND A FREE WIN. after seeing that i lost 24 lp i came to right this because fuck you riot. sorry not sorry.

1. Actually though... i lost 2 games together get it together. {{item:3070}} fully stacked
